definition: To propel an object through the air using force, typically with the intention of reaching a target. This action is commonly associated with sports, games, or activities involving projectiles.

examples.german: Er wirft einen Stein ins Wasser.
examples.english: He throws a stone into the water.

examples.german: Sie hat den Brief in den Briefkasten geworfen.
examples.english: She threw the letter into the mailbox.

examples.german: Wirf den Müll in den Mülleimer!
examples.english: Throw the trash in the trash can!

examples.german: Der Athlet hat den Speer weit geworfen.
examples.english: The athlete threw the javelin far.
